<Meta title="Theming/Imperative Style" />

# Imperative Style

```javascript
const select = useRowSelect(data);

// get all state
console.log(select.state);

// ... then in the Row component when you assign the className conditionally:

<Row className={select.state.ids.includes(item.id) ? "multi-selected" : "not-selected"}  ... >

// ... or for single select

<Row className={select.state.id === item.id ? "single-selected" : "not-selected"}  ... >

// then you can use the new class in your theme and style it
// the same workflow can be used for inline style
```
